response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. We believe this offers a unique opportunity for you to own a masterpiece that could potentially appreciate in value over time. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 850000}
